security_audit.summary: This skill generates images using OpenAI DALL-E API. It requires network access to communicate with OpenAI and writes files to the public directory. All capabilities are appropriate for an image generation tool.

content.user_title: Generate visual assets with DALL-E AI
content.value_statement: Create custom images and illustrations for your project using OpenAI DALL-E 3. The skill generates high-quality visual assets that match your style requirements.
actual_capabilities: Create assets in specific project folders
Apply minimalist SaaS style to images
limitations: Depends on OpenAI API service availability

use_cases.title: Marketing visuals
use_cases.description: Create hero images and promotional graphics for campaigns

use_cases.title: UI illustrations
use_cases.description: Generate custom illustrations for interfaces and documentation

use_cases.title: Social media assets
use_cases.description: Create branded images for social platforms

prompt_templates.title: Simple image request
prompt_templates.prompt: Create an image for a modern software dashboard interface

prompt_templates.title: Marketing asset
prompt_templates.prompt: Generate a hero image for a SaaS landing page showing growth metrics

prompt_templates.title: Illustration request
prompt_templates.prompt: Create a minimalist flat illustration of a team collaborating on documents

prompt_templates.title: Styled asset
prompt_templates.prompt: Generate a logo-style icon in minimalist corporate memphis style with tech blue colors

output_examples.input: Create an image for a modern software dashboard interface

best_practices: Use specific style keywords like minimalist, flat, vector for consistent results
Place assets in appropriate subfolders for organization
Include transparent or white background requests for easy compositing
anti_patterns: Avoid vague prompts without style direction
Do not generate copyrighted characters or trademarked imagery
Do not rely on generated images as sole source of truth for technical diagrams

faq.question: Which AI tools support this skill?
faq.answer: The skill works with Claude, Codex, and Claude Code on the skill-enabled version.

faq.question: What image size does DALL-E 3 generate?
faq.answer: DALL-E 3 generates 1024x1024 pixel images with HD quality.

faq.question: How do I connect my OpenAI account?
faq.answer: Set the OPENAI_API_KEY environment variable in your .env file or terminal session.

faq.question: Is my image data stored or shared?
faq.answer: Images are generated through OpenAI API and saved locally in your project directory only.

faq.question: What if image generation fails?
faq.answer: Verify your API key is valid, you have API credits, and check your network connection.

faq.question: How does this compare to other image generators?
faq.answer: This skill uses DALL-E 3 specifically with optimized prompts for SaaS and modern design styles.
